name: Search issues
description: Find issues by state and keyword.

params.name: state
params.description: Indicates the state of the issues to return. Can be either `open` or `closed`.

name: Search repositories
description: Find repositories by keyword. Note, this legacy method does not follow the v3 pagination pattern. This method returns up to 100 results per page and pages can be fetched using the `start_page` parameter.

params.name: sort
params.description: The sort field. One of `stars`, `forks`, or `updated`.
params.default: results are sorted by best match.

params.name: order
params.description: The sort field. if `sort` param is provided. Can be either `asc` or `desc`.

params.name: sort
params.description: The sort field. One of `stars`, `forks`, or `updated`.
params.default: results are sorted by best match.

params.name: order
params.description: The sort field. if `sort` param is provided. Can be either `asc` or `desc`.

name: Email search
description: This API call is added for compatibility reasons only. There's no guarantee that full email searches will always be available. The `@` character in the address must be left unencoded. Searches only against public email addresses (as configured on the user's GitHub profile).
